00024 #include "sys_time.h"
00025 #include "subsystems/radio_control.h"
00026 #include "subsystems/radio_control/ppm.h"
00027 
00028 #include <inttypes.h>
00029 #include <caml/mlvalues.h>
00030 
00031 #ifdef USE_NPS
00032 #include "nps_radio_control.h"
00033 #endif
00034 
00035 uint8_t  ppm_cur_pulse;
00036 uint32_t ppm_last_pulse_time;
00037 bool_t   ppm_data_valid;
00038 
00039 void ppm_arch_init ( void ) {
00040   ppm_last_pulse_time = 0;
00041   ppm_cur_pulse = RADIO_CONTROL_NB_CHANNEL;
00042   ppm_data_valid = FALSE;
00043   ppm_frame_available = FALSE;
00044 }
00045 
00046 #ifdef RADIO_CONTROL
00047 
00048 value update_rc_channel(value c, value v) {
00049   ppm_pulses[Int_val(c)] = Double_val(v);
00050   return Val_unit;
00051 }
00052 
00053 value send_ppm(value unit) {
00054   ppm_frame_available = TRUE;
00055   return unit;
00056 }
00057 
00058 #ifdef USE_NPS
00059 #define PPM_OF_NPS(_nps, _neutral, _min, _max)                          \
00060   ((_nps) >= 0 ? (_neutral) + (_nps) * ((_max)-(_neutral)) : (_neutral) + (_nps) * ((_neutral)- (_min)))
00061 
00062 void radio_control_feed(void) {
00063   ppm_pulses[RADIO_ROLL]     = PPM_OF_NPS(nps_radio_control.roll,       \
00064                                           RADIO_ROLL_NEUTRAL,          \
00065                                           RADIO_ROLL_MIN,              \
00066                                           RADIO_ROLL_MAX);
00067   ppm_pulses[RADIO_PITCH]    = PPM_OF_NPS(nps_radio_control.pitch,      \
00068                                           RADIO_PITCH_NEUTRAL,         \
00069                                           RADIO_PITCH_MIN,             \
00070                                           RADIO_PITCH_MAX);
00071   ppm_pulses[RADIO_YAW]      = PPM_OF_NPS(nps_radio_control.yaw,        \
00072                                           RADIO_YAW_NEUTRAL,           \
00073                                           RADIO_YAW_MIN,               \
00074                                           RADIO_YAW_MAX);
00075   ppm_pulses[RADIO_THROTTLE] = PPM_OF_NPS(nps_radio_control.throttle,   \
00076                                           RADIO_THROTTLE_NEUTRAL,      \
00077                                           RADIO_THROTTLE_MIN,          \
00078                                           RADIO_THROTTLE_MAX);
00079   ppm_pulses[RADIO_MODE]     = PPM_OF_NPS(nps_radio_control.mode,       \
00080                                           RADIO_MODE_NEUTRAL,          \
00081                                           RADIO_MODE_MIN,              \
00082                                           RADIO_MODE_MAX);
00083   ppm_frame_available = TRUE;
00084 }
00085 #endif
00086 
00087 #else // RADIO_CONTROL
00088 
00089 value update_rc_channel(value c __attribute__ ((unused)), value v __attribute__ ((unused))) {
00090   return Val_unit;
00091 }
00092 
00093 value send_ppm(value unit) {
00094   return unit;
00095 }
00096 
00097 #ifdef USE_NPS
00098 void radio_control_feed(void) {}
00099 #endif
00100 
00101 #endif // RADIO_CONTROL
